titleStmt.title: The royall guest: or, A sermon preached at Lent Assises, anno Dom. M.DC.XXXVI. at the cathedrall of Sarum being the first Sunday of Lent, before Sr. Iohn Finch and Sr. John Denham His Majesties justices of assise. By Thomas Drant of Shafton in com. Dorset.
titleStmt.author: Drant, Thomas, b. 1601 or 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M[iller] for Walter Hammond, and are to be sold by Michael Sparke in Greene-Arbour,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
